Class TerminalSessionInput

java.lang.Object
  org.radrails.rails.internal.ui.terminal.TerminalSessionInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.ui.IEditorInput
public class TerminalSessionInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.ui.IEditorInput

Editor input for the Terminal window. Contains the root of the currently selected project and an optional command to run.

mkent
